channel.title: 2022 on MiR Community
channel.description: Recent content in 2022 on MiR Community

item.title: Hello 2022
item.description: To a new MiR year Welcome to a new year! The MiR Community has so many plans for engagement and learning opportunities. This is the year for our global community to come together and share our knowledge skills and lift each other up. The goals this year is to expand our community reach and engagement, from all levels of R knowledge and occupations. The MiR blog is the place we want you, yes YOU, to feel welcome and to engage with us.
